column4: there's a breezy version of a package that I want to install on my hoary system - is there a best practices doc on that?  d/l'ing and dpkg -i'ing would be fine with me, but i wanted to make sure doing so is the best approach (if it is)
pinning may help (though I don't pretend to understand it). http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/PinningHowto
